help-file.title: FRAGS
help-file.content:
Syntax: frag frag <classname> frag <racename> frag <racewarsidename>
The term "frag", originally taken from the Vietnam War, is when you kill another player. Every time you kill someone who is an opposite racewar side, (a Human killing a Drow, etc), you get a frag. Every time you are killed by someone who is an opposite racewar side, (a Phantom being killed by a Drow), you lose a frag. All frags are split between the group equally. So, if you are with a group of five people and you kill one player, you will each receive .20 frags. For each player killed, there is a total of 1.00 frags to be split among the grouped victors. Typing "fraglist" will show a list of the top ten and lowest ten fraggers in the mud. Or, you may type "frag <racewarside>", "frag <classname>" or "<frag racename>".
